OrgName: Makhteshim Agan of North America, Inc.
PPLoc: It is on our website and is distributed to employees; see link below
activities: Makhteshim Agan of North America, Inc. uses worker personal information it receives from its affiliates in North America and the EU for purposes of doing global compensation analysis.  No data is gathered for individuals outside the organization and its affiliates and no personal information is collected on the company website.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Only employee information for the organization and its North American and global affiliates is covered by this policy.
recoursemech: Makhteshim Agan of North America commits to cooperating with data protection authorities located in the European Union and Switzerland or their authorized representatives.
